entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog becoming fog patches overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:16 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
